snippet: The former pitcher Pascual Perez, who had a troubled career, was killed at his home in the Dominican Republic in an apparent robbery, the police said Thursday. He was 55.
abstract: Former pitcher Pascual Perez, who had troubled career, is killed at his home in Dominican Republic in apparent robbery.
lead_paragraph: The former pitcher Pascual Perez, who had a troubled career, was killed at his home in the Dominican Republic in an apparent robbery, the police said Thursday. He was 55.

headline.seo: Former Pitcher, Pascual Perez, Is Killed in Dominican Republic
headline.main: Former Pitcher Is Killed in Dominican Republic
headline.print_headline: Pascual Perez Is Killed in Dominican Republic
